thread.title: BHP Spinoff South32 Hits Troubled Times as Commodities Sag
thread.title_full: BHP Spinoff South32 Hits Troubled Times as Commodities Sag - WSJ

author: Rhiannon Hoyle
title: BHP Spinoff South32 Hits Troubled Times as Commodities Sag
text:
SYDNEY—When South32 Ltd., the mining company spun out of BHP Billiton Ltd., launched in May, its backers claimed its low debt and focus on a clutch of commodities would help it weather any stormy markets ahead.
Five months after one of the biggest breakups in corporate mining history, those claims are already in doubt.
South32’s stock has...
